meanings.definition: Not diversified; lacking variety or range.
meanings.sent1: The nondiversified menu only offered one type of sandwich.
meanings.sent2: Her wardrobe was nondiversified, consisting only of black dresses.
meanings.sent3: The nondiversified movie plot was so predictable, it put everyone to sleep.
meanings.sent4: His nondiversified taste in music only included one genre.
meanings.sent5: The nondiversified landscape was a sea of identical trees stretching for miles.
